ai-ja353:1.2_0: when plenty of food and drink,
ai-ja353:1.4_0: And because the crags were divided in the middle of the Ganges.
ai-ja353:2.1_0: But a person lives to come
ai-ja353:2.3_0: A doer of good gets good,
ai-ja353:2.4_0: a doer of bad gets bad.
ai-ja353:2.5_0: Whatever kind of seed you sow,
ai-ja353:2.6_0: that is the fruit you reap.”
ai-ja353:5.3_0: I’ll pass away after passing away,
ai-ja353:5.4_0: That’s why I shall be healthy again.”
